answer: Future research on UHE neutrino scattering onto relic cosmic neutrinos may be motivated by the potential to overcome the GZK cut-off and uncover new information about neutrino masses and relic densities (astro-ph/0102426).
explanation: This paper discusses the possibility of using UHE neutrino scattering onto relic cosmic neutrinos to overcome the GZK cut-off and gain insight into neutrino masses and relic densities.
